description:
Treeworks subject to tree preservation order

Tree Preservation Application At:

Flat B, 15 Canonbury Square, Islington, London, N1 2AL

TPO Reference:

T1 – Plane of LBI TPO (No.280) 2006
T2 – Plane of LBI TPO (No.280) 2006

PO Number:

T120115

Work specifications:

1 x Plane (T1).
Cut back by up to 4 m the 4 lowest branches over the highway. 20 % crown thin. Cut back to clear building by 4m. Lift canopy over highway by up to 10 m.
1 x Plane (T2). Deadwood.
Remove side branch overhanging the pavement and road back to the curb line. Reduce high level branches overhanging the road by 4m. Crown thin by 20 %. Reduce lowest branch over garden back to upright shoot near the main trunk. Lift canopy over high way by up to 10 m. Deadwood.
X1 Fruit tree.
Remove branch on wall, the branch growing towards the building and remove the smaller branch growing into garden. Lift canopy by 1m over pavement. Prune back over pavement.
X1 Small Ash.
Remove.
